abstract: A.T.M. enhancements like the Wells Fargo option continue to grow, even in the age of smartphones and mobile banking.
snippet: A.T.M. enhancements like the Wells Fargo option continue to grow, even in the age of smartphones and mobile banking.
lead_paragraph: With mobile payment options increasingly available to consumers, the automated teller machine might seem like an anachronism. Who needs cash when you can buy stuff with your phone?

headline.main: Wells Fargo Customers Can Cash Out Rewards at A.T.M.s
